title: BRIEF-Berjaya Philippines Posts Qtrly Revenue Of 7.83 Bln Pesos
text:
BRIEF-Berjaya Philippines Posts Qtrly Revenue Of 7.83 Bln Pesos

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 20, 2019 15:00)

BRIEF-Berjaya Philippines Posts Qtrly Revenue Of 7.83 Bln Pesos Sept 20 (Reuters) - Berjaya Philippines Inc :

* QTRLY NET LOSS ATTRIBUTABLE 477,886 PESOS VERSUS PROFIT OF

346.2

MILLION PESOS

* QTRLY REVENUE 7.83 BILLION PESOS VERSUS 9.64 BILLION PESOS



Source text for Eikon: ID:nPSX2k1F3c

Further company coverage: BCOR.PS





BRIEF-Berjaya Philippines Posts Qtrly Revenue Of 7.83 Bln Pesos
